title: Pixel3a part of screen not working properly
content:
Hello, 

This problem started after I updated to android 11 about earlier this week a specific part of my screen does seem to register press. Specifically around the w and 2 keys is where the area is affected. When I try to press either key it just presses q or e and 1 and 3 respectively. I have tried to boot into safe mode but didn't seem to work but I have not tried to hard reset the phone either. I am currently trying to charge the phone via computer but I doubt it will do anything. 

If anyone else has encountered this issue please lmk.

Thanks,
Ron
